summary.span: 支持使用 对象的 或 访问器访问该对象的属性值。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanMove As Boolean
public: property bool CanMove { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定是否可以移动 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element can be moved.

value.span: 如果可以移动该元素，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element can be moved; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象不能移动、调整大小或旋转, 使其生成的屏幕位置完全在其容器的坐标之外并且无法访问键盘或鼠标。An object cannot be moved, resized or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如, 当顶级窗口完全移离屏幕或子对象移动到容器的视区边界之外时。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这种情况下, 将对象放置在尽可能靠近所请求的屏幕坐标的位置, 并将其重写为位于容器边界内。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 将从获取一个控件模式, 并随后用于移动。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to move the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanResize As Boolean
public: property bool CanResize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素是否可以调整大小。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element can be resized.

value.span: 如果元素可以调整大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element can be resized; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能移动、调整大小或旋转对象, 使其生成的屏幕位置完全在其容器的坐标之外并且无法通过键盘或鼠标访问。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如, 当顶级窗口完全移离屏幕或子对象移动到容器的视区边界之外时。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这种情况下, 将对象放置在尽可能靠近所请求的屏幕坐标的位置, 并将其重写为位于容器边界内。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 将从获取一个控件模式, 并随后用于调整。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to resize the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#104)]
